strapiEvent.name: SoNA Presents Peter & The Wolf
strapiEvent.description:
Enjoy a bilingual performance of the classic children's tale Peter & The Wolf by the Symphony of Northwest Arkansas at Victory Theater in Downtown Rogers on Thursday, Jul 13, at 4:30p and 5:30p.

  • When & Where: The symphonic fairy tale is set to the timeless music of Sergei Prokofiev, featuring 5 players and two narrators (1 English, 1 Spanish). Each character is represented by an instrument in the orchestra â€” Flute, Violin, Clarinet, Cello, and French Horn.
  • Keep walking: Each performance lasts just 25 minutes. So you can make a night of it after the show by exploring local art during the Art on the Bricks July Art Walk or enjoying the Local Showcase Thursday at Railyard Live.

General admission is $5 in advance and $7 at the door. Reserve your seats HERE.
